title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Make Your Mark - McKenzie Field Hangar
content:
Oscar Guzman is offering you an opportunity to earn a load of cash. To begin, purchase the McKenzie Field Hangar. Inside, you’ll find a wall panel where you can request your aircraft and a laptop in your new office where you can launch missions.

If you own a Smuggler Hangar, you’ll also be gifted an additional 15 personal aircraft slots.

Purchase from Maze Bank Foreclosures or walk up to the “For Sale” sign at the hangar to begin your arms trafficking adventures.
